00014 AlCaElectronTracksReducer::AlCaElectronTracksReducer(const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig) 
00015 {
00016 
00017   //gsfTracksLabel_ = iConfig.getParameter< edm::InputTag > ("gsfTracksLabel");
00018   generalTracksLabel_ = iConfig.getParameter< edm::InputTag > ("generalTracksLabel");
00019   generalTracksExtraLabel_ = iConfig.getParameter< edm::InputTag > ("generalTracksExtraLabel");
00020   electronLabel_ = iConfig.getParameter< edm::InputTag > ("electronLabel");
00021 
00022   // name of the output collection
00023   //gsfTracksCollection_ = iConfig.getParameter<std::string>("gsfTracksCollection");
00024   alcaTrackExtraCollection_ = iConfig.getParameter<std::string>("alcaTrackExtraCollection");
00025   
00026   //register your products
00027   produces< reco::TrackCollection > (alcaTrackCollection_) ;
00028   produces< reco::TrackExtraCollection > (alcaTrackExtraCollection_) ;
00029 
00030 }

00037 // ------------ method called to produce the data  ------------
00038 void AlCaElectronTracksReducer::produce (edm::Event& iEvent, 
00039                                 const edm::EventSetup& iSetup)
00040 {
00041   using namespace edm;
00042   using namespace std;
00043   using namespace reco;
00044 
00045   // get the ECAL geometry:
00046 //   ESHandle<CaloGeometry> geoHandle;
00047 //   iSetup.get<CaloGeometryRecord>().get(geoHandle);
00048 
00049 //   edm::ESHandle<CaloTopology> theCaloTopology;
00050 //   iSetup.get<CaloTopologyRecord>().get(theCaloTopology);
00051 //   const CaloTopology *caloTopology = theCaloTopology.product();
00052   
00053   // Get GSFElectrons
00054   Handle<reco::GsfElectronCollection> pElectrons;
00055   iEvent.getByLabel(electronLabel_, pElectrons);
00056 //   if (!pElectrons.isValid()) {
00057 //     edm::LogError ("reading") << electronLabel_ << " not found" ; 
00058 //     return ;
00059 //   }
00060   
00061   const reco::GsfElectronCollection * electronCollection = 
00062     pElectrons.product();
00063   
00064   Handle<TrackCollection> generalTracksHandle;
00065   iEvent.getByLabel(generalTracksLabel_,generalTracksHandle);
00066   
00067   Handle<TrackExtraCollection> generalTracksExtraHandle;
00068   iEvent.getByLabel(generalTracksExtraLabel_,generalTracksExtraHandle);
00069  
00070   //Create empty output collections
00071   std::auto_ptr< TrackCollection > redGeneralTracksCollection (new TrackCollection) ;
00072   std::auto_ptr< TrackExtraCollection > redGeneralTracksExtraCollection (new TrackExtraCollection) ;
00073   
00074   reco::GsfElectronCollection::const_iterator eleIt;
00075 
00076   for (eleIt=electronCollection->begin(); eleIt!=electronCollection->end(); eleIt++) {
00077     // barrel
00078 #ifndef CMSSW42X
00079     TrackRef track = (eleIt-> closestTrack() ) ;
00080 #else
00081     TrackRef track = (eleIt-> closestCtfTrackRef());
00082 #endif
00083     if(track.isNull()){
00084       //      edm::LogError("track") << "Track Ref not found " << eleIt->energy() << "\t" << eleIt->eta();
00085       continue;
00086     }
00087     redGeneralTracksCollection->push_back(*track);
00088     if(generalTracksExtraHandle.isValid()) redGeneralTracksExtraCollection->push_back(*(track->extra()));
00089   }
00090   
00091   //Put selected information in the event
00092   iEvent.put( redGeneralTracksCollection, alcaTrackCollection_ );
00093   iEvent.put( redGeneralTracksExtraCollection, alcaTrackExtraCollection_ );
00094 }
00095

00097 DEFINE_FWK_MODULE(AlCaElectronTracksReducer);
